visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Observing the location of the object to align the hand or tool for pickup.
examples: Seeing a ball on the floor
Noticing a book on a shelf

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Identifying optimal points on the object for secure grip.
examples: Spotting the handle of a cup
Locating the edge of a box

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Monitoring the object's movement or steadiness during pickup.
examples: Checking if a plate is balanced on a table
Watching a toy roll slightly

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Using visual cues to anticipate the object's texture and adjust grip.
examples: Recognizing a glossy, smooth surface of a glass
Identifying a rough wooden toy

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Visually inferring the weight of the object based on its size and material.
examples: A small metal tool appearing heavy
A large plastic container seeming light

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Distinguishing the object from its surroundings based on color.
examples: Seeing a red toy on a beige carpet
Spotting a black remote on a white table

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Observing the alignment of the object to adjust pickup approach.
examples: Noticing a bottle lying horizontally
Seeing a chair upright

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Identifying any obstacles around the object that may hinder pickup.
examples: Spotting toys around a box
Noticing a book under a pile of clothes

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Visually tracking the hand or tool movement to make corrections during pickup.
examples: Aligning a gripper with a ball
Adjusting hand movement while grabbing a towel

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Observing the moment the hand or tool makes contact with the object.
examples: Seeing fingers touch a cup's handle
Noticing a claw gripper clamp onto a box
